about_the_game:
Cateia Games proudly presents Country Tales2: New Frontiers, our newest time management strategy game in which you build, explore, gather, produce, trade, clear roads and much, much more, all while enjoying the fun storyline full of interesting characters!



The town has a new sheriff. But the town also has a new villain. It's up to you to join forces with young sheriff Harriet and her friends to discover colonel Gross's ambitious (read: evil) plans and stop him and his minions before the take over the West!

Enjoy in beautiful HD graphics and animations; build towns and settlements, upgrade your production and trade, take care of your people and win medals and achievements along the way in this gorgeous colorful time management strategy city builder game.



This COLLECTOR'S EDITION version contains some special features:
  • Bonus levels
    - Clear the Road style levels
    - Free City Build mode
  • Additional achievements



    • JOIN the new sheriff in town, forge new friendships and explore the Wild West
    • DOZENS of unique levels, bonus levels, medals and collectables to win
    • BUILD, upgrade, trade, collect, clear the road, explore and much more...
    • 3 DIFFICULTY MODES: Relaxed, Timed, and Extreme; each one with unique challenges, bonuses, and achievements
    • USE BOOSTERS on levels to help you reach your goals
    • STEP BY STEP tutorials for beginners
    • COLLECTOR'S EDITION includes: 20 bonus levels and additional achievements
    • GORGEOUS high definition visuals and animations

Cateia Games proudly presents Country Tales2: New Frontiers, our newest time management strategy game in which you build, explore, gather, produce, trade, clear roads and much, much more, all while enjoying the fun storyline full of interesting characters!



The town has a new sheriff. But the town also has a new villain. It's up to you to join forces with young sheriff Harriet and her friends to discover colonel Gross's ambitious (read: evil) plans and stop him and his minions before the take over the West!

Enjoy in beautiful HD graphics and animations; build towns and settlements, upgrade your production and trade, take care of your people and win medals and achievements along the way in this gorgeous colorful time management strategy city builder game.



This COLLECTOR'S EDITION version contains some special features:

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any Linux Distro from 2012 or newer
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any OpenGL compatible driver
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any SDL_mixer compatible driver

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.13
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

movies.name: Country Tales 2: New Frontiers Trailer HD

name: Country Tales 2: New Frontiers Collector's Edition

package_groups.name: default

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows: Xp, Vista, 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Join the new sheriff in town, forge strong friendships and explore the Wild West in this fun and dynamic time management strategy game! Enjoy in dozens of unique levels, bonus levels, medals and collectables; build, upgrade, trade, collect, clear the road, explore and much more...
